verses.name: Jeremiah 5:12
verses.text: They have belied the Lord, and said, It is not he; neither shall evil come upon us; neither shall we see sword nor famine:

verses.name: Jeremiah 5:13
verses.text: And the prophets shall become wind, and the word is not in them: thus shall it be done unto them.

verses.name: Jeremiah 5:14
verses.text: Wherefore thus saith the Lord God of hosts, Because ye speak this word, behold, I will make my words in thy mouth fire, and this people wood, and it shall devour them.
